title: Ubuntu LXC
textContent:
Ubuntu LXC 
                 Option to select version 
                Ubuntu is a distribution based on Debian, designed to have regular releases and a consistent user
                experience.
                To create a new Proxmox VE Ubuntu LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/ubuntu.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 512MiB RAM - 2GB Storage - 1vCPU - 22.04 ⚡
outerHTML:
Ubuntu LXC

Option to select version

Ubuntu is a distribution based on Debian, designed to have regular releases and a consistent user experience.

To create a new Proxmox VE Ubuntu LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/ubuntu.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 512MiB RAM - 2GB Storage - 1vCPU - 22.04 ⚡
